edits.oldString:
<CardTitle className="text-2xl font-semibold">Welcome to Linguala</CardTitle>
          <CardDescription>
            Join the EU's translation platform. Access your personal history, custom glossaries, and professional tools for all 24 EU languages
          </CardDescription>
edits.newString:
<CardTitle className="text-2xl font-semibold">Sign In to Linguala</CardTitle>
          <CardDescription>
            Access your translation history, custom glossaries, and professional EU translation tools
          </CardDescription>

edits.oldString:
<Button
              type="submit"
              disabled={!email || isLoading}
              className="w-full bg-blue-600 hover:bg-blue-700"
            >
              <Mail className="h-4 w-4 mr-2" />
              {isLoading ? "Sending..." : "Sign in with Email"}
            </Button>
edits.newString: New to Linguala? No account needed - we'll create one for you automatically

edits.oldString: By signing in, you agree to our terms of service and privacy policy.
edits.newString:
First time here? Just enter your email or use Google - we'll automatically create your account and unlock all premium features!

By continuing, you agree to our terms of service and privacy policy.
